title: Filmmaker Series: Adam Pranica on Boogie Nights
itunes:title: Filmmaker Series: Adam Pranica on Boogie Nights
description:
Adam Pranica continues his Paul Thomas Anderson filmmaker series with the all-time classic, Boogie Nights.
